name: Renovation of heritage properties: energy conservation vs building conservation
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Renovating heritage property requires a careful balance between energy conservation measures and maintaining the original features of the building. This session looks at some practical steps which can be taken to thermally upgrade heritage homes and dispels some of the myths around renovating in particular listed buildings. It also includes a case study of renovating a Victorian property.
